verses.verse: It<WG2532> happened<WG1096> on<WG1722> one<WG1520> of those<WG1565> days,<WG2250> as he<WG846> was teaching<WG1321> the people<WG2992> in<WG1722> the temple<WG2411> and<WG2532> preaching the Good News,<WG2097> that the priests<WG749> and<WG2532> scribes<WG1122> came to<WG2186> him with<WG4862> the elders.<WG4245>

the baptism<WG908> of John,<WG2491> was it<WG2258> from<WG1537> heaven,<WG3772> or<WG2228> from<WG1537> men?<WG444>"

But<WG1437> if<WG1437> we say,<WG2036> <WG1537> 'From men,<WG444>' all<WG3956> the people<WG2992> will stone<WG2642> us,<WG2248> for<WG1063> they are<WG1511> persuaded that<WG3982> John<WG2491> was<WG2076> a prophet.<WG4396>"
They answered<WG611> that they<WG1492> didn't<WG3361> know<WG1492> where<WG4159> it was from.<WG4159>

<WG1161> He<WG756> began to tell<WG3004> the<WG4314> people<WG2992> this<WG3778> parable.<WG3850> "A<WG5100> man<WG444> planted<WG5452> a vineyard,<WG290> and<WG2532> rented<WG1554> it<WG846> out<WG1554> to some farmers,<WG1092> and<WG2532> went into another country<WG589> for a long<WG2425> time.<WG5550>

<WG2532> At<WG1722> the proper season,<WG2540> he sent<WG649> a servant<WG1401> to<WG4314> the farmers<WG1092> to<WG4314> collect<WG1325> his<WG846> share of<WG575> the fruit<WG2590> of the vineyard.<WG290> But<WG1161> the farmers<WG1092> beat<WG1194> him,<WG846> and sent<WG1821> him away<WG1821> empty.<WG2756>

He<WG2532> sent<WG3992> yet<WG4369> another<WG2087> servant,<WG1401> and<WG2532> they also<WG2548> beat<WG1194> him,<WG1161> and treated<WG818> him shamefully,<WG818> and sent<WG1821> him away<WG1821> empty.<WG2756>
He sent<WG3992> yet a third,<WG5154> and<WG2532> they also<WG2532> wounded<WG5135> him,<WG5126> and<WG1161> threw<WG1544> him<WG5126> out.<WG1544>

The<WG1161> lord<WG2962> of the vineyard<WG290> said,<WG2036> <WG5101> 'What shall I do?<WG4160> I will send<WG3992> my<WG3450> beloved<WG27> son.<WG5207> It may be<WG2481> that seeing him,<WG5126> they will respect<WG1788> him.<WG5126>'

"But<WG1161> when the farmers<WG1092> saw<WG1492> him,<WG846> they reasoned<WG1260> among<WG4314> themselves,<WG1438> saying,<WG3004> <WG3778> 'This is<WG2076> the heir.<WG2818> Come,<WG1205> let<WG615>'s kill him,<WG846> that<WG2443> the inheritance<WG2817> may be<WG1096> ours.<WG2257>'

They<WG2532> threw<WG1544> him<WG846> out of<WG1854> the vineyard,<WG290> and killed<WG615> him.<WG5101> What therefore<WG3767> will<WG4160> the lord<WG2962> of the vineyard<WG290> do<WG4160> to them?<WG846>

He will come<WG2064> and<WG2532> destroy<WG622> these<WG5128> farmers,<WG1092> and<WG2532> will give<WG1325> the vineyard<WG290> to others.<WG243>" When<WG1161> they heard<WG191> it,<WG3361> they said, "May it never be!<WG1096>"

But<WG1161> he looked<WG1689> at them,<WG846> and said,<WG2036> "Then<WG3767> what<WG5101> is<WG2076> this<WG5124> that<WG3588> is written,<WG1125> <WG3037> 'The stone which<WG3739> the builders<WG3618> rejected,<WG593> the same<WG3778> was made<WG1096> the<WG1519> chief<WG2776> cornerstone?<WG1137>'

Everyone<WG3956> who falls<WG4098> on<WG1909> that<WG1565> stone<WG3037> will be broken<WG4917> to pieces,<WG1161> but it will crush<WG3039> whomever<WG3739><WG99999> it falls<WG4098> on<WG1909> to<WG846> dust.<WG3039>"

The<WG2532> chief priests<WG749> and<WG2532> the scribes<WG1122> sought<WG2212> to lay<WG1911> hands<WG5495> on<WG1909> him<WG846> that<WG1722> very<WG846> hour,<WG5610> but<WG2532> they feared<WG5399> the people<WG2992> â€” for<WG1063> they knew<WG1097> he<WG3754> had spoken<WG2036> this<WG3778> parable<WG3850> against<WG4314> them.<WG846>

They<WG1455> watched<WG3906> him,<WG649> and sent out spies,<WG1455> who pretended<WG5271> <WG1438> <WG1511> to be righteous,<WG1342> that<WG2443> they might trap<WG1949> him in something he<WG846> said,<WG3056> so<WG2443> as to deliver<WG3860> him<WG846> up to<WG1519> the power<WG746> and<WG2532> authority<WG1849> of the governor.<WG2232>

They<WG2532> asked<WG1905> him,<WG846> <WG3004> "Teacher,<WG1320> we know<WG1492> that<WG3754> you say<WG3004> and<WG2532> teach<WG1321> what is right,<WG2532> and<WG2532> aren't<WG2983> partial to anyone,<WG4383> but<WG235><WG99999> truly<WG225> teach<WG1321> the way<WG3598> of God.<WG2316>
Is it lawful<WG1832> for us<WG2254> to pay<WG1325> taxes<WG5411> to Caesar,<WG2541> or<WG2228> not?<WG3756>"
But<WG1161> he perceived<WG2657> their<WG846> craftiness,<WG3834> and said<WG2036> to<WG4314> them,<WG846> "Why<WG5101> do you<WG3985> test me? <WG3165>
Show<WG1925> me<WG3427> a denarius.<WG1220> Whose<WG5101> image<WG1504> and<WG2532> inscription<WG1923> are on it?<WG2192>" They answered,<WG611> "Caesar<WG2541>'s."

He<WG1161> said<WG2036> to them,<WG846> "Then<WG5106> give<WG591> to Caesar<WG2541> the things<WG3588> that are Caesar<WG2541>'s, and<WG2532> to God<WG2316> the things<WG3588> that are God<WG2316>'s."

They<WG2532> weren't<WG3756> able<WG2480> to trap<WG1949> him<WG846> in his words<WG4487> before<WG1726> the people.<WG2992> They marveled<WG2296> at<WG1909> his<WG846> answer,<WG612> and<WG2532> were silent.<WG4601>
<WG1161> Some<WG5100> of the Sadducees<WG4523> came to<WG4334> him,<WG483> those who<WG3588> deny<WG3361> that there is<WG1511> a resurrection.<WG386>

They asked<WG1905> him,<WG846> <WG3004> "Teacher,<WG1320> Moses<WG3475> wrote<WG1125> to us<WG2254> that if<WG1437> a man<WG5100>'s brother<WG80> dies<WG599> having<WG2192> a wife,<WG1135> and<WG2532> he<WG3778> is<WG599> childless,<WG815> <WG2443> his<WG846> brother<WG80> should take<WG2983> the wife,<WG1135> and<WG2532> raise up<WG1817> sons<WG4690> for his<WG846> brother.<WG80>
There were<WG2258> therefore<WG3767> seven<WG2033> brothers.<WG80> The first<WG4413> took<WG2983> a wife,<WG1135> and<WG2532> died<WG599> childless.<WG815>
The second<WG1208> took<WG2983> her<WG3778> as wife,<WG1135> and<WG2532> he<WG3778> died<WG599> childless.<WG815>
The<WG2532> third<WG5154> took<WG2983> her,<WG846> and<WG2532> likewise<WG5615> the seven<WG2033> all<WG2532> left<WG2641> no<WG3756> sons,<WG5043> and<WG2532> died.<WG599>
Afterward<WG5305> the<WG3956> woman<WG1135> also<WG2532> died.<WG599>
Therefore<WG3767> in<WG1722> the resurrection<WG386> whose<WG5101> wife<WG1135> of them<WG846> will she<WG1096> be?<WG1063> For the seven<WG2033> had<WG2192> her<WG846> as a wife.<WG1135>"
<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> <WG611> said<WG2036> to them,<WG846> "The sons<WG5207> of this<WG5127> age<WG165> marry,<WG1060> and<WG2532> are given in marriage.<WG1548>

But<WG1161> those who<WG3588> are considered worthy<WG2661> to attain<WG5177> to that<WG1565> age<WG165> and<WG2532> the resurrection<WG386> from<WG1537> the dead,<WG3498> neither<WG3777> marry,<WG1060> nor<WG3777> are given in marriage.<WG1548>

For<WG3777> they can't<WG1410> die<WG599> any more,<WG2089> for<WG1063> they are<WG1526> like the angels,<WG2465> and<WG2532> are<WG1526> sons<WG5207> of God,<WG2316> being<WG5607> sons<WG5207> of the resurrection.<WG386>

But<WG1161> that<WG3754> the dead<WG3498> are raised,<WG1453> even<WG2532> Moses<WG3475> showed<WG3377> at<WG1909> the bush,<WG942> when<WG5613> he called<WG3004> the Lord<WG2962> <WG2316> 'The God of Abraham,<WG11> the<WG2532> God<WG2316> of Isaac,<WG2464> and<WG2532> the God<WG2316> of Jacob.<WG2384>'
Now<WG1161> he is<WG2076> not<WG3756> the God<WG2316> of the dead,<WG3498> but<WG235> of the living,<WG2198> for<WG1063> all<WG3956> are alive<WG2198> to him.<WG846>"
<WG1161> Some<WG5100> of the scribes<WG1122> answered,<WG2036> <WG2036> "Teacher,<WG1320> you<WG2036> speak<WG2036> well.<WG2573>"
They<WG1161> didn't<WG3765> dare<WG5111> to ask<WG1905> him<WG846> any more questions.<WG3762>
He<WG1161> said<WG2036> to<WG4314> them,<WG846> "Why<WG4459> do they<WG3004> say that the Christ<WG5547> is<WG1511> David<WG1138>'s son?<WG5207>

<WG2532> David<WG1138> himself<WG846> says<WG3004> in<WG1722> the book<WG976> of Psalms,<WG5568> <WG2962> 'The Lord said<WG2036> to my<WG3450> Lord,<WG2962> "Sit<WG2521> at<WG1537> my<WG3450> right hand,<WG1188>
until<WG2193><WG99999> I make<WG5087> your<WG4675> enemies<WG2190> the footstool<WG4228> of your feet.<WG4675>"'
"David<WG1138> therefore<WG3767> calls<WG2564> him<WG846> Lord,<WG2962> so how<WG4459> is he<WG2076> <WG2532> his<WG846> son?<WG5207>"
In<WG1161> the hearing<WG191> of all<WG3956> the people,<WG2992> he said<WG2036> to his<WG846> disciples,<WG3101>

"Beware<WG4337> of<WG575> the scribes,<WG1122> who<WG3588> like<WG2309> to walk<WG4043> in<WG1722> long robes,<WG4749> and<WG2532> love<WG5368> greetings<WG783> in<WG1722> the marketplaces,<WG58> the<WG2532> best seats<WG4410> in<WG1722> the synagogues,<WG4864> and<WG2532> the best places<WG4411> at<WG1722> feasts;<WG1173>

who<WG3739> devour<WG2719> widows<WG5503>' houses,<WG3614> and<WG2532> for a pretense<WG4392> make<WG4336> long<WG3117> prayers:<WG4336> these<WG3778> will receive<WG2983> greater<WG4053> condemnation.<WG2917>"
